body.example: 1989 is the fifth studio album by American singer-songwriter Taylor Swift...

body.name: length
body.description: The length (in milliseconds) of the album.

body.name: recorded_at
body.description: The year the album was recorded.

body.name: released_at
body.description: A unix timestamp of the year the album was released.

body.name: cover_image
body.description: A link to the image of the album. It must be a JPEG encoded image that is 1500x1500.

body.name: label_id
body.description: The ID of the label the album was released under.

body.name: genre_ids
body.description: An array of ID's of the genres the album falls under.

body.name: producer_ids
body.description: An array of ID's of the people who produced the album.

body.name: studio_ids
body.description: An array of ID's of the studios where the album was recorded.
